name: Interstellar Rising
description:
[Early Demo]

Interstellar Rising is an open ended narrative game where you play as a galactic mercenary, acquiring influence troughout the galaxy while mediating your relationship with other people.

This is an early version (0.5) with a lot of stuff still missing, like a bigger soundtrack, some locations or any form of overarching storyline among other systems.

The final version of the game, due to the beggining of next year, will be paid and will be released as another project, but we appreciate if anyone wants to spare some money for the demo to help out with the development.

made by the umunum collective
fonts by @somepx

follow us on twitter at @umunumCo
